mapper.select:
SELECT tj.name, tj.emId, tj.orgId, tj.state, tj.case_count, tj.total_case_money, tj.cp_money, tj.cp_back_paid, tj.paid_num, tj.back_paid, tj.cp_case_count, tj.paid_case_count, tj.rate FROM
( #确认还款率【已确认还款案件数量（已确认的还款）/CP确认案件还款数量（cp正常和已确认的还款）】 SELECT em.user_name AS NAME,em.id AS emId, em.`status` AS state,em.org_id as orgId, ci.case_count, CONVERT(IFNULL(ci.total_case_money, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS total_case_money, IFNULL(cp1.cp_money, 0) AS cp_money, CONVERT(IFNULL(cp1.cp_back_paid, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS cp_back_paid, IFNULL(cp2.paid_num, 0) AS paid_num, CONVERT(IFNULL(cp2.back_paid, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS back_paid, cp1.cp_case_count, cp2.paid_case_count, cp2.rate AS rate
FROM `employee_info` em #案件数量 #案件金额（委案金额之和）委案日期<=D2且退案日期>=D1的案件 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT case_info.id) AS case_count, case_info.case_backdate, case_info.`case_date`, case_info.`case_assigned_id`, SUM(case_info.case_money) AS total_case_money
FROM case_info
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL #AND (begin_date <='2016-11-22' AND cb.end_date >= '2016-06-25')
and (case_date <= '${params.normalDate1}' and case_info.case_backdate >= '${params.normalDate}')
GROUP BY case_assigned_id ) AS ci ON ci.case_assigned_id = em.id #未确认还款（cp正常的cp金额之和） D1=<CP日期<=D2且还款状态为CP正常 #未确认佣金 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cp.cp_time, cp.`se_no`, SUM(cp.cp_money) AS cp_money, SUM(IFNULL(cp.back_paid, 0)) AS cp_back_paid, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id) AS cp_case_count
FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state = '1' #AND ('2016-01-01' <= cp_time <= '2016-01-31')
and (DATE_FORMAT(cp_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY se_no ) AS cp1 ON cp1.se_no = em.id #已确认还款（已确认的已还款金额） D1=<还款日期<=D2 #已确认佣金 #平均费率=佣金/已确认还款 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cp.paid_time, cp.`se_no`, SUM(cp.paid_num) AS paid_num, SUM(IFNULL(cp.back_paid, 0)) AS back_paid, CONVERT((IFNULL(SUM(cp.back_paid), 0)*100) / (IFNULL(SUM(cp.paid_num), 0)),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS rate, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id)AS paid_case_count
FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state='2' #AND ('2016-01-01' <= paid_time <= '2016-01-31')
and (DATE_FORMAT(paid_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY se_no ) AS cp2 ON cp2.se_no = em.id
) AS tj WHERE 1=1
and tj.emId in
#{params.emIds[${index}]}
and orgId IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_organization WHERE path LIKE CONCAT(( SELECT path FROM sys_organization WHERE id = #{params.orgId} ), '%') )
order by ${sort} ${order}
ORDER BY tj.state DESC, CONVERT(tj.name USING gbk) ASC

SELECT
tj.name, tj.emId, tj.orgId, tj.state, tj.case_count, tj.total_case_money, tj.la_count, tj.la_case_money, tj.average_count, tj.cp_money, tj.paid_num, tj.cp_case_count, tj.paid_case_count, tj.paid_rate, tj.ptp_money, tj.ptp_case_count, tj.zlz_paid_num, tj.zlz_paid_case_count, tj.paid_count_rate, tj.paid_money_rate
FROM ( #确认还款率【已确认还款案件数量（已确认的还款）/CP确认案件还款数量（cp正常和已确认的还款）】 SELECT em.user_name AS NAME,em.id AS emId, em.`status` AS state,em.org_id AS orgId, ci.case_count, IFNULL(ci.average_count,0) AS average_count, CONVERT(IFNULL(ci.total_case_money, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS total_case_money, la.case_count AS la_count, CONVERT(IFNULL(la.total_case_money, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS la_case_money, cp0.ptp_money, cp0.ptp_case_count, IFNULL(cp1.cp_money, 0) AS cp_money, IFNULL(cp2.paid_num, 0) AS paid_num, cp1.cp_case_count, cp2.paid_case_count, cp3.zlz_paid_num, cp3.zlz_paid_case_count,
IFNULL(CONVERT((IFNULL(cp2.paid_case_count, 0)*1000) / IFNULL(ci.case_count, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)),0) AS paid_count_rate, IFNULL(CONVERT((IFNULL(cp2.paid_num, 0)*1000) / IFNULL(ci.total_case_money, 0),DECIMAL(18,2)),0) AS paid_money_rate, IFNULL(CONVERT((IFNULL(cp2.paid_case_count, 0) - IFNULL(cp3.zlz_paid_case_count, 0))*100 / (IFNULL(cp1.cp_case_count, 0) + IFNULL(cp2.paid_case_count, 0) - IFNULL(cp3.zlz_paid_case_count, 0)) ,DECIMAL(18,2)),0) AS paid_rate
FROM `employee_info` em #案件数量 #案件金额（委案金额之和）委案日期<=D2且退案日期>=D1的案件 #平均案件金额（委案金额（案件的）/案件数量） LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT case_info.id) AS case_count,case_info.`case_assigned_id`, case_info.case_backdate,case_info.`case_date`, SUM(case_info.case_money) AS total_case_money, CONVERT(IFNULL(SUM(case_info.case_money), 0)/(IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT case_info.id), 0)),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS average_count
FROM case_info
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL #and (case_info.`case_date` <='2016-11-25' and case_info.case_backdate >= '2016-06-22')
and (case_info.`case_date` <= '${params.normalDate1}' and case_info.case_backdate >= '${params.normalDate}')
GROUP BY `case_assigned_id`
) AS ci ON ci.`case_assigned_id` = em.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT case_info.id) AS case_count,case_info.`case_assigned_id`, case_info.case_backdate,case_info.`case_date`, SUM(case_info.case_money) AS total_case_money
FROM case_info
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL #and (case_info.`case_date` <='2016-11-25' and case_info.case_backdate >= '2016-06-22')
and (DATE_FORMAT(case_info.case_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY `case_assigned_id`
) AS la ON la.`case_assigned_id` = em.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cp.`se_no`,cp.`ptp_time`, SUM(cp.`ptp_money`) AS ptp_money, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id)AS ptp_case_count
FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state='0' #AND ('2016-11-25'>= paid_time >= '2016-06-22')
and (DATE_FORMAT(cp.`ptp_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY se_no
) AS cp0 ON cp0.se_no = em.id #未确认还款（cp正常的cp金额之和） D1=<CP日期<=D2且还款状态为CP正常 #CP确认案件还款数量（cp正常和已确认的还款）
#未确认还款 #已确认还款
#确认还款率（已确认还款案件数量/CP确认案件还款数量) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cp.cp_time,cp.`se_no`, SUM(cp.cp_money) AS cp_money, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id) AS cp_case_count
FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state = '1' #AND ('2016-11-25'>= cp_time >= '2016-06-22')
and (DATE_FORMAT(cp_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY se_no
) AS cp1 ON cp1.se_no = em.id
#已确认还款（已确认的已还款金额） D1=<还款日期<=D2 #已确认还款案件数量（已确认的还款） LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cp.paid_time,cp.`se_no`, SUM(cp.paid_num) AS paid_num, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id)AS paid_case_count
FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state='2' #AND ('2016-11-25'>= paid_time >= '2016-06-22')
and (DATE_FORMAT(paid_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY se_no
) AS cp2 ON cp2.se_no = em.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cp.paid_time,cp.`se_no`, SUM(cp.paid_num) AS zlz_paid_num, COUNT(DISTINCT cp.case_id)AS zlz_paid_case_count
FROM case_paid cp LEFT JOIN case_info ON cp.case_id=case_info.id
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL AND cp.state='2' AND cp.`repay_type`='2' #AND ('2016-11-25'>= paid_time >= '2016-06-22')
and (DATE_FORMAT(paid_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY se_no
) AS cp3 ON cp3.se_no = em.id
) AS tj WHERE 1=1
and tj.emId in
#{params.emIds[${index}]}
and orgId IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_organization WHERE path LIKE CONCAT(( SELECT path FROM sys_organization WHERE id = #{params.orgId} ), '%') )
order by ${sort} ${order}
ORDER BY tj.state DESC, CONVERT(tj.name USING gbk) ASC

SELECT tj.name, tj.emId, tj.orgId, tj.state, tj.case_count, tj.phone_count, tj.visit_count, tj.apply_count, tj.assist_count FROM ( SELECT em.user_name AS NAME,em.id AS emId,em.`status` AS state,em.org_id as orgId, ci.case_count, ci1.phone_count, vrd.visit_count, ci2.apply_count, ci2.assist_count FROM `employee_info` em #案件数量 #电催次数 #外访次数 #协催次数 #查资次数 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT case_info.id) AS case_count, case_info.case_backdate,case_info.`case_date`, case_info.`case_assigned_id`
FROM case_info WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND case_info.org_id IS NOT NULL #AND (case_date <='2016-07-31' AND case_info.case_backdate >= '2016-07-01')
and (case_date <= '${params.normalDate1}' and case_info.case_backdate >= '${params.normalDate}')
GROUP BY case_assigned_id
) AS ci ON ci.case_assigned_id = em.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pr.create_time, case_info.`case_assigned_id`, SUM(CASE WHEN pr.pr_cat = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS phone_count, SUM(CASE WHEN pr.pr_cat = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS visit_count
FROM case_info JOIN phone_record pr ON pr.case_id = case_info.`id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1
and (DATE_FORMAT(pr.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY case_assigned_id
) AS ci1 ON ci1.case_assigned_id = em.id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT case_info.`case_assigned_id`, ca.`sur_time`, SUM(CASE WHEN (ca.apply_type = '4' OR ca.apply_type = '6' OR ca.apply_type = '12' OR ca.apply_type = '9' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS apply_count, SUM(CASE WHEN (ca.apply_type = '11' OR ca.apply_type = '7' OR ca.apply_type = '5' OR ca.apply_type = '10' ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS assist_count
FROM case_apply ca LEFT JOIN case_info ON ca.`case_id` = case_info.`id`
WHERE 1=1 and case_info.status!=-1 #AND (ca.`sur_time` between '2016-05-01' and '2016-06-01')
and (DATE_FORMAT(ca.`sur_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY case_assigned_id
) AS ci2 ON ci2.case_assigned_id = em.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT info.`case_assigned_id`, vr.`actual_visit_time`, SUM(CASE WHEN vr.state = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS visit_count
FROM visit_record vr LEFT JOIN case_info info ON vr.`case_id`=info.`id`
WHERE 1=1 and info.status!=-1
and (DATE_FORMAT(vr.`actual_visit_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.normalDate} and #{params.normalDate1})
GROUP BY case_assigned_id
) AS vrd ON vrd.case_assigned_id = em.id
) AS tj WHERE 1=1
and tj.emId in
#{params.emIds[${index}]}
and orgId IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_organization WHERE path LIKE CONCAT(( SELECT path FROM sys_organization WHERE id = #{params.orgId} ), '%') )
order by ${sort} ${order}
ORDER BY tj.state DESC, CONVERT(tj.name USING gbk) ASC

SELECT tj.id, tj.batch_code, tj.begin_date, tj.end_date, tj.case_count, tj.total_case_money, tj.ptp_money, tj.cp_money, tj.paid_num, tj.achieve, tj.target, tj.new_case_count, tj.lose_case_count, tj.involve_case_count, tj.negotiation_case_count, tj.family_case_count, tj.someone_case_count, tj.oneself_case_count FROM (
SELECT cb.batch_code,cb.begin_date,cb.end_date,cb.id, COUNT( ci.id) AS case_count, CONVERT(IFNULL(SUM(ci.case_money), 0),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS total_case_money, IFNULL(cp.ptp_money, 0) AS ptp_money, IFNULL(cp.cp_money, 0) AS cp_money, IFNULL(cp.paid_num, 0) AS paid_num, CONVERT((IFNULL(cb.achieve, 0) * IFNULL(cp.paid_num, 0)) / 100,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS achieve, CONVERT((IFNULL(cp.paid_num, 0) / IFNULL(SUM(ci.case_money), 0)) * 100,DECIMAL(18,2)) AS target, SUM(CASE WHEN (ci.collec_state_id = '0' OR ci.collec_state_id IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS new_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN (ci.collec_state_id = '30' OR ci.collec_state_id = '87') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS lose_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.collec_state_id = '34' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS involve_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.collec_state_id = '88' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS negotiation_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.collec_state_id = '28' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS family_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.collec_state_id = '29' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS someone_case_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ci.collec_state_id = '27' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS oneself_case_count
FROM case_batch cb LEFT JOIN case_info ci ON cb.id=ci.batch_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT case_paid.case_id, SUM(case_paid.ptp_money) AS ptp_money, SUM(case_paid.cp_money) AS cp_money, SUM(case_paid.paid_num) paid_num FROM ( SELECT case_id, SUM( IF (state = 2,IFNULL(paid_num, 0),0) ) AS paid_num, SUM( IF (state = 1,IFNULL(cp_money, 0),0) ) AS cp_money, SUM( IF (state = 0,IFNULL(ptp_money, 0),0) ) AS ptp_money FROM case_paid GROUP BY case_id ) case_paid GROUP BY case_id ) AS cp ON cp.case_id = ci.id
GROUP BY cb.id ORDER BY ci.create_time DESC ) AS tj where 1=1
AND tj.id IN
#{id}
order by begin_date desc
